name: International Rescue Committee
description: Provides humanitarian aid, relief, and resettlement assistance to refugees and displaced persons worldwide.

name: United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR)
description: Leads international efforts to protect and assist refugees and forcibly displaced populations.

name: American Immigration Council
description: Advocates for immigrants' rights and a fair immigration system in the United States.

name: Human Rights First
description: Works to protect the rights of refugees and asylum seekers, advocating for fair asylum processes.

name: Catholic Legal Immigration Network
description: https://cliniclegal.org/sites/default/files/styles/medium/public/2021-01/CLINIC%20-%20Logo%20color.png
info: Supports legal immigration services and advocates for immigrant rights in the United States.

name: Asylum Seeker Advocacy Project (ASAP)
description: Provides legal assistance and community support to asylum seekers in the United States.

name: International Institute of Los Angeles
description: Offers immigration legal services, refugee resettlement, and immigrant support programs in Los Angeles.

name: Refugee Transitions
description: Empowers refugee and immigrant newcomers to achieve self-sufficiency and success in the United States.

name: Tahirih Justice Center
description: Protects immigrant women and girls fleeing violence and advocates for gender justice.

name: HIAS
description: Provides humanitarian aid and legal assistance to refugees and asylum seekers worldwide.

name: Freedom for Immigrants
description: Works to abolish immigration detention and advocates for the rights of detained immigrants.

name: Kids in Need of Defense (KIND)
description: Protects the rights of unaccompanied immigrant and refugee children in the United States.

name: The Young Center for Immigrant Children's Rights
description: Promotes the best interests of unaccompanied immigrant children by providing legal advocacy and support.

name: Immigrant Legal Resource Center
description: Supports immigration attorneys and advocates for immigrant rights and justice.

name: No More Deaths
description: A humanitarian organization providing aid and advocacy for migrants along the U.S.-Mexico border.

name: National Immigrant Justice Center
description: Provides legal services and advocates for immigrant and refugee rights in the United States.

name: The Florence Project
description: Offers free legal services to immigrants and refugees detained in Arizona.

name: Al Otro Lado
description: Provides legal and humanitarian aid to migrants and refugees at the U.S.-Mexico border.

name: World Relief
description: Empowers local churches to assist immigrants and refugees in the United States.

name: Human Rights Initiative of North Texas
description: Provides legal and social services to refugees and immigrants seeking safety in the United States.
